abstract: College counselors and admissions directors gather at a Manhattan hotel to discuss what qualities they look for most when evaluating applicants' strengths and weaknesses.
snippet: College counselors and admissions directors gather at a Manhattan hotel to discuss what qualities they look for most when evaluating applicants' strengths and weaknesses.
lead_paragraph: College counselors and admissions directors crowded a hotel conference room on Thursday afternoon, many sitting on the floor for want of enough chairs, as William Fitzsimmons, dean of admissions at Harvard, joined in a discussion on "The Ideal High School Graduate."
